channel.title: When window 7 run my client please help
channel.description: i have the right code butwhen they try to log it they get a ton of errors in it for some reason the code to run it is @echo off @title Client cd Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32 thats the code to run it but when they open it the client come up and so do a ton of errors can someone tell me how to fix it this client does work on window xp and windows vista though someone please help

item.title: When window 7 run my client please help
item.dc:creator: @mellen mellen
item.description:
@mellen wrote:

i have the right code butwhen they try to log it they get a ton of errors in it for some reason the code to run it is
@echo off
@title Client
cd Client
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32
thats the code to run it but when they open it the client come up and so do a ton of errors can someone tell me how to fix it this client does work on window xp and windows vista though
someone please help

Read full topic
item.source: When window 7 run my client please help
